description: A fresh take on a classic. This speedy tuna pasta salad recipe has it all â€“ a light and creamy yoghurt-based dressing, fresh herbs, tomato and crunchy cucumber.
keywords: Pasta salad,Pescatarian,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Speedy Tuna Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g canned tuna in springwater, drained, flaked
1 bunch spring onions, white part only, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 8 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Refresh under cold water, then drain.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, sauce and oil in a large bowl. Season.
Add pasta, capsicum, tomato, cucumber, red onion, tuna, dill and spring onion to yoghurt mixture and gently toss to combine. Season. Serve sprinkled with extra dill.
